title: Fire Alarm (Romance, 1932) by Karl Brown | Colorized Movie

sources.title: Fire Alarm (Romance, 1932) by Karl Brown | Colorized Movie
sources.description:
Fearless firefighter Charlie Jones struggles to romance Pat, the blonde whose cat he rescued, but eventually succeeds in kindling warmth in her heart.

Original title: Flames (1932) AKA: Fire Alarm / Fatal Alarm
This film is subtitled in many languages.

Black & White version: https://youtu.be/UPOtgP_sQoI


Director: Karl Brown
Writers: Karl Brown, Lee Chadwick 
Stars: Johnny Mack Brown, George Cooper, Noel Francis 
Genres: Classics, Drama, Action, Adventure, Romance


00:00 Full Movie (with subtitles)
01:24 Fire alarm mishap leads to unexpected romantic encounter and humorous misunderstandings.
13:27 A young woman starts a new job as a secretary and catches the eye of her wealthy boss.
15:57 Drama unfolds as relationships and misunderstandings arise in a workplace setting.
23:48 Unexpected romance leads to tragic consequences in a fire emergency.
29:23 A fire emergency in a ten-story building, leading to emotional interactions and a sense of impending danger.
35:31 Unexpected visit leads to confusion and misunderstandings in a romantic setting.
42:22 Romantic drama unfolds as misunderstandings lead to chaos and confrontation at a party.
46:18 Betrayal and deception unfold as relationships are tested in a small town setting.
52:24 A dramatic rescue unfolds in a building on fire, leading to a heartfelt apology and gratitude.
